testsuite.name: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update an equipment according to given equipment_id

testcase.name: When user authenticate with password "test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update an equipment according to given equipment_id

testcase.name: Then the response status code should be 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update an equipment according to given equipment_id

testcase.name: Given the following equipments
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update an equipment according to given equipment_id

testcase.name: When user sends PUT request to endpoint /equipment/22Y2071 with content-type application/json and empty headers and body {"valve": "test", "actuator" :"test","postioner":"test","sensor":"test"}
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update an equipment according to given equipment_id

testcase.name: Then the response status code should be 201
testcase.classname: Scenario: User calls a rest endpoint to update an equipment according to given equipment_id

testcase.name: Then the response status code should be 200

testcase.name: And the json response has "equipment" object
